channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 40 Best Early Amazon Prime Day Deals on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)
item.description: Amazon Prime Day is back on October 7, but we've already found good deals on WIRED-approved gear.

item.title: Toyota adds another $1.5B to its bet on startups at every stage
item.description: Toyota made two announcements that reflect the automaker's growing interest in startups working on mobility, climate, AI, sustainability, and industri...

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on HBO Max Right Now (October 2025)
item.description: Task, Peacemaker, and The Pitt are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: A breach every month raises doubts about South Korea’s digital defenses
item.description: Known for its blazing fast internet and home to some of the world’s biggest tech giants, South Korea has also faced a string of data breaches and cybe...

item.title: Former OpenAI and DeepMind researchers raise whopping $300M seed to automate science
item.description: Periodic Labs has raised from a tech industry who's who, including Andreessen Horowitz, Nvidia, Elad Gil, Jeff Dean, Eric Schmidt, and Jeff Bezos.

item.title: Anonymous question app Sendit deceived children and illegally collected their data, FTC alleges
item.description: On Sendit, teens can send each other anonymous questions via integrations with Instagram or Snapchat.

item.title: Ted Cruz blocks bill that would extend privacy protections to all Americans
item.description: The Texas senator blocked a bill that would have prevented data brokers from selling personal data on anyone in the United States, and not just federa...

item.title: 11 Best White Noise Machines (2025): Lectrofan, Snooz, Hatch, and More
item.description: Help the whole family catch more Z’s with soothing background noise from our favorite sound machines.

item.title: Everything Amazon Announced Today at Its Fall Hardware Event (2025)
item.description: Amazon's next-gen Alexa+ chatbot is now available in four new Echo devices and a bevy of Ring cameras. The company also debuted three new Kindle Scrib...

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 10 Is $170 Off
item.description: The rose gold option with GPS and cellular data is down to its lowest price yet for the Apple Watch Series 10.
